title: Araxis Merge 2007.3350.rar
description:
Araxis Merge 2007.3350

It\&#039;s a file comparison/diff/merge tool used mainly by programmers and web administrators.

1) Install.

2) Copy the patch to the install dir.

3) Run the patch.

4) Delete BASSMOD.dll in \\windows\\system32

5) Use your firewall to block Araxis Merge from connecting to the internet.


NB: The patch creates BASSMOD.dll in the system32 dir. It\&#039;s harmless and you can delete it. It\&#039;s used only to play the music.
